## Technical Details

### File Location
`/Users/liborballaty/LocalProjects/GitHubProjectsDocuments/Permahub/src/wiki/js/wiki-i18n.js`

### File Statistics
- **Total lines:** 3,433
- **Total file size:** ~250 KB
- **Format:** JavaScript ES6 object
- **Structure:** Flat key-value pairs per language

### Export Method
- **Global:** `window.wikiI18n` (for script tags)
- **CommonJS:** `module.exports = { wikiI18n }` (for Node.js)
- **ES6:** Not exported (script tag only)

### Module Integration
All module files now use global reference:
```javascript
// wikiI18n is loaded globally via script tag in HTML
const wikiI18n = window.wikiI18n;
```

**Modified files:**
- [src/wiki/js/wiki-editor.js](src/wiki/js/wiki-editor.js:9-10)
- [src/wiki/js/wiki-home.js](src/wiki/js/wiki-home.js:9-10)
- [src/wiki/js/wiki-guides.js](src/wiki/js/wiki-guides.js:9-10)
- [src/wiki/js/wiki-page.js](src/wiki/js/wiki-page.js:9-10)
- [src/wiki/js/wiki-events.js](src/wiki/js/wiki-events.js:9-10)
- [src/wiki/js/wiki-map.js](src/wiki/js/wiki-map.js:9-10)

## Verification Commands

### Run Full Verification
```bash
node scripts/verify-translations-complete.js
```

### Check Specific Language Keys
```bash
# Count Portuguese keys
grep "^      'wiki\." src/wiki/js/wiki-i18n.js | grep -A 1000 "pt: {" | grep -B 1000 "es: {" | grep -c "wiki\."

# Count Spanish keys
grep "^      'wiki\." src/wiki/js/wiki-i18n.js | grep -A 1000 "es: {" | grep -B 1000 "fr: {" | grep -c "wiki\."

# Count Czech keys
grep "^      'wiki\." src/wiki/js/wiki-i18n.js | grep -A 1000 "cs: {" | grep -B 1000 "sk: {" | grep -c "wiki\."
```
